StoryEnsemble

Transforming Design Thinking from Linear to Dynamic, Iterative Workflow with Generative AI

UC San Diego

Univ of Toronto

System

StoryEnsemble is a system that uses generative AI to help users rapidly explore and iterate on personas, problem statements, solutions, and storyboards.
